comment.label: Please let us know what map you miss
comment.help: Please be polite and constructive and give us as many details to build the map you miss.

sparql.label: Your SPARQL query suggestion
sparql.placeholder: Enter here the SPARQL query you want to go live as a map
sparql.help: Giving a fully-working SPARQL query will help to boost your map selection! Try on query.wikidata.org before submit.
